revised_title: Examination of the Nests of the Java Swallow and the Glands That Secreted the Mucus
tldr: Sir Everard Home examines the glandular structure and chemical composition of the nests of the Java Swallow, confirming that the mucus is secreted by specialized glands in the bird's oesophagus and stomach. The nests' unique structure and chemical properties are discussed, setting them apart from other bird nests.
